sources.title: A Stolen Jackpot | Full Movie | Comedy Drama
sources.description:
A Stolen Jackpot - Tom Bennet is trying to do the right thing but his good intentions keep getting derailed by his scheming fiancé and a hustler who want his $350 million dollar lottery ticket. Mix in skullduggery with a stolen investment formula, a childhood sweetheart, and a couple of homicidal pensioners, and Tom has a long way to go before learning it's okay to lose once you've learned what's worth winning!
2012.  Stars: Shirin Caiola, Maggie Curley, Robert Davidson

metadata.Plot: Award winning movie. A Stolen Jackpot tells the story of love and luck turning on the toss of a coin. Tom Bennet is trying to do the right thing, but his good intentions keep getting derailed by his scheming fiancé and a hustler who want his $350 million dollar lottery ticket. Mix in skullduggery with a stolen investment formula, a childhood sweetheart, and a couple of homicidal pensioners, and Tom has a long way to go before he learns that it's okay to lose once you've learned what's worth winning!
metadata.Writer: Satya Kharkar (story), Mary Trimble (story), Mary Trimble
metadata.Actors: Shirin Caiola, Maggie Curley, Robert Davidson, Brent Foster
